name: Area 69 (SquidTim)
description:
A small project I did bc I wanted to experiment with java and see how it worked.

now,  I couldn't get the java project to export to a runnable program(like a .jar file or .exe) so the download is the whole project, and will only un in a code editor, sorry!

Jerry is an alien trapped in a government facility. He doesn’t care that he has to stay. But one day Jerry hears he's going to be tested on with, fun, equipment. So he decides to escape. Jerry escapes by hopping past the guards and hopping in the space ship he came in(it got confiscated), he escapes the facility but there are now drones pursuing him, so he must fight off the drones yada yada, yeah the story is pretty stupid, its just there to fill the description
